text: Ján Žiška is a rower from Slovakia. Žiška competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. He was born on 29 January 1971.Ján Žiška == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Rowers Category:Olympians for Slovakia Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Ján Žiška
